name: Onnect - Connect Pair Puzzle
description:
New connect pair game is coming!
Onnect is a relaxing puzzle suit for all ages, start it whenever you tired or get bored, the game helps you feel better. Solve the puzzle within few minutes and try to be a master! Various tiles including Mahjong, umbrella, cake, etc, update regularly.
The FREE game is a great time-killing puzzle, play it everyday to train your brain, use the boosters if you get confused. Now download it and have fun!

FEATURES:
- Easy to start but hard to master
- Various images, Mahjong, food, emoji, animals, etc
- Auto-save, convenient to pause
- Two modes, normal or no-time
- Relieve stress and relax yourself
- Train your brain and have fun

HOW TO PLAY?
- Match tiles with the same images
- Connect 2 pairs within 3 lines
- Remove all tiles within limited time
- Use hint booster to get tips
- Use shuffle booster to refresh the tiles
- Use demolition booster to remove bomb

Premium Subscription:
- You can subscribe for unlimited access to unlock vip themes, remove non-reward ads, double rewards and double daily bonus.
- Weekly subscription is $1.99 after 3-day free trial, monthly $4.99, yearly $29.99.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours
before the end of the current period.
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours
before the end of the current period.
- Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current
period at the cost of the chosen subscription.
- Subscriptions may be managed by the user and auto-renewal may be turned off by
going to the user's Account Settings after purchase.
- No cancel action of the current subscription is allowed during active subscription period.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user
purchases a subscription to that content.
